Directions: Base your answer to the following questions on the information below and on your knowledge of science.
Title: Canada Lynx
Content: The list below describes some characteristics of the Canada lynx, an animal that is a member of the cat family.

:ibox:• Found in the colder climates of Canada and Alaska
• Thick, dense fur
• Preys on small animals, such as the snowshoe hare
• Large spaces between teeth so that bite enters prey as deeply as possible
• Wide feet to walk better over snow and ice
